languages.text: "Скажи мне..." {n}Чорда с явным усилием поднимает на вас взгляд.{/n} "Найдется ли в душе твоей снисхождение к заблудшей? Твой крестовый поход — достойное деяние, и я жажду стать его частью. Суди других ты — я буду лишь твоим инструментом".

"Tell me..." {n}Chorda looks up at you with obvious effort.{/n} "Is there any leniency in your soul for one who has strayed? Your crusade is a worthy endeavour, and I long to be a part of it. Let you stand in judgement over others — I shall be but your instrument."
languages.original_text: "Скажи мне..." {n}Чорда с явным усилием поднимает на вас взгляд.{/n} "Найдется ли в душе твоей снисхождение к заблудшей? Твой крестовый поход — достойное деяние, и я жажду стать его частью. Суди других ты — я буду лишь твоим инструментом".

traits.locale_text: "Tell me..." {n}Chorda looks up at you with obvious effort.{/n} "Is there any leniency in your soul for one who has strayed? Your crusade is a worthy endeavour, and I long to be a part of it. Let you stand in judgement over others — I shall be but your instrument."

"Tell me..." {n}Chorda looks up at you with obvious effort.{/n} "Is there any leniency in your soul for one who has strayed? Your crusade is a worthy endeavour, and I long to be a part of it. Let you stand in judgement over others — I shall be but your instrument."

"Tell me..." {n}Chorda looks up at you with obvious effort.{/n} "Is there any leniency in your soul for one who has strayed? Your crusade is a worthy endeavour, and I long to be a part of it. Let you stand in judgement over others — I shall be but your instrument."

"Tell me..." {n}Chorda looks up at you with obvious effort.{/n} "Is there any leniency in your soul for one who has strayed? Your crusade is a worthy endeavour, and I long to be a part of it. Let you stand in judgement over others — I shall be but your instrument."

languages.text: “告诉我……”{n}库尔达挣扎着，努力抬起头，看着你。{/n}“在你的心中，有没有对迷途之人的宽容？这场远征意义重大，我渴望成为这场远征中的一员。就由你来审判其他人吧，我愿意成为你的工具。”
languages.original_text: "Tell me..." {n}Chorda looks up at you with obvious effort.{/n} "Is there any leniency in your soul for one who has strayed? Your crusade is a worthy endeavour, and I long to be a part of it. Let you stand in judgement over others — I shall be but your instrument."

traits.locale_text: “告诉我……”{n}库尔达挣扎着，努力抬起头，看着你。{/n}“在你的心中，有没有对迷途之人的宽容？这场远征意义重大，我渴望成为这场远征中的一员。就由你来审判其他人吧，我愿意成为你的工具。”

languages.text: «Dígame...». {n}Chorda levanta la mirada hacia ti.{/n} «¿Le queda en su alma algo de compasión para alguien que ha descarriado? Su cruzada es digna y anhelo poder participar. Será usted quien juzgue, yo solo seré un mero instrumento».
languages.original_text: "Tell me..." {n}Chorda looks up at you with obvious effort.{/n} "Is there any leniency in your soul for one who has strayed? Your crusade is a worthy endeavour, and I long to be a part of it. Let you stand in judgement over others — I shall be but your instrument."

traits.locale_text: «Dígame...». {n}Chorda levanta la mirada hacia ti.{/n} «¿Le queda en su alma algo de compasión para alguien que ha descarriado? Su cruzada es digna y anhelo poder participar. Será usted quien juzgue, yo solo seré un mero instrumento».

languages.text: 「教えてほしい…」{n}チョーダは力を振り絞ってあなたを見上げる。{/n}「お前の魂には、道を踏み外した者への寛容というものはあるのか？お前の聖戦は、価値ある尽力であり、私もその一端を担いたい。お前に他者を裁かせる…私はその道具で構わない」
languages.original_text: "Tell me..." {n}Chorda looks up at you with obvious effort.{/n} "Is there any leniency in your soul for one who has strayed? Your crusade is a worthy endeavour, and I long to be a part of it. Let you stand in judgement over others — I shall be but your instrument."

traits.locale_text: 「教えてほしい…」{n}チョーダは力を振り絞ってあなたを見上げる。{/n}「お前の魂には、道を踏み外した者への寛容というものはあるのか？お前の聖戦は、価値ある尽力であり、私もその一端を担いたい。お前に他者を裁かせる…私はその道具で構わない」

languages.text: {n}Chorda lève les yeux vers vous avec un effort visible.{/n} « Dites-moi... Votre âme saurait-elle faire preuve d'indulgence envers quelqu'un qui s'est éloigné du droit chemin ? Votre croisade est louable et j'aimerais beaucoup en faire partie. Vous pourrez vous servir de moi comme instrument pour appliquer votre justice. »
languages.original_text: "Tell me..." {n}Chorda looks up at you with obvious effort.{/n} "Is there any leniency in your soul for one who has strayed? Your crusade is a worthy endeavour, and I long to be a part of it. Let you stand in judgement over others — I shall be but your instrument."

traits.locale_text: {n}Chorda lève les yeux vers vous avec un effort visible.{/n} « Dites-moi... Votre âme saurait-elle faire preuve d'indulgence envers quelqu'un qui s'est éloigné du droit chemin ? Votre croisade est louable et j'aimerais beaucoup en faire partie. Vous pourrez vous servir de moi comme instrument pour appliquer votre justice. »

languages.text: "Sagt ..." {n}Chorda blickt mit offensichtlicher Mühe zu dir auf.{/n} "Gibt es in Eurer Seele Gnade für jemanden, der vom Weg abgekommen ist? Euer Kreuzzug ist ein würdiges Unterfangen, und ich möchte daran teilhaben. Ihr sollt über andere urteilen — ich werde nur als Euer Instrument dienen."
languages.original_text: "Tell me..." {n}Chorda looks up at you with obvious effort.{/n} "Is there any leniency in your soul for one who has strayed? Your crusade is a worthy endeavour, and I long to be a part of it. Let you stand in judgement over others — I shall be but your instrument."

traits.locale_text: "Sagt ..." {n}Chorda blickt mit offensichtlicher Mühe zu dir auf.{/n} "Gibt es in Eurer Seele Gnade für jemanden, der vom Weg abgekommen ist? Euer Kreuzzug ist ein würdiges Unterfangen, und ich möchte daran teilhaben. Ihr sollt über andere urteilen — ich werde nur als Euer Instrument dienen."

languages.text: "Söylesene..." {n}Chorda, belirgin bir çabayla başını kaldırıp sana bakıyor.{/n} "Kalbinde yoldan sapmış birine müsamaha gösterecek kadar merhamet var mı? Kutlu cihadının bir parçası olmak için can atıyorum. Hüküm sende olsun, ben yalnızca kılıcın olmak isterim."
languages.original_text: "Tell me..." {n}Chorda looks up at you with obvious effort.{/n} "Is there any leniency in your soul for one who has strayed? Your crusade is a worthy endeavour, and I long to be a part of it. Let you stand in judgement over others — I shall be but your instrument."
